alert.note: Alert for San Juan (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 01 at 7:29PM MDT until October 01 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: The National Weather Service in Grand Junction has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central San Juan County in southeastern Utah... * Until 800 PM MDT. * At 729 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Fry Canyon, or 39 miles northwest of Mexican Hat, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Fry Canyon around 740 PM MDT. This includes Utah 95 between mile markers 61 and 86. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
